content:
# The recipe for crafting a stone furnace indicates that I need 5 stones, but I currently have no information about whether I possess any stones in my inventory.
# Since I don't have a stone furnace to begin with, I will need to gather stones first.

# I will search for nearby stone patches to collect the necessary stones.
nearest_stone_patch = find_nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Find the nearest stone resource patch.
print(f"Nearest stone patch located at: {nearest_stone_patch}")  # Output the location of the nearest stone patch. 

# After locating the stone patch, I will proceed to gather stones from it.
gather_resource(nearest_stone_patch, quantity=5)  # Attempt to gather 5 stones.
